product.name: Corona X1
product.short: A nano-processor implanted directly in the cerebral cortex, which enables you to filter visual and auditory information.
product.description: Corona X1 is a nano-processor implanted directly in the cerebral cortex, which enables the user to filter visual and auditory information according to preselected filters.  Together with the implant, the users receive a Skinput Interface which enables them to control the processor.
